And I saved you a slice.
Two more days, just two more days.

translation.es: Será muy difícil no recordar estos

It's sweet. She wanted to be here.
Oh, come on. You made her come.

Pam, I don't want you worrying a bit about Grace on this trip.

Robert y yo estuvimos hablando,y pensamos... ¿Sí?

why not kick this new sister thing into high gear?

Meg is going to Paris, too. (CHUCKLES)

No to the sisterhood of the traveling to France?

Honey, you don't have to do that.

translation.en: you and Pam do with your lives.

Because I don't know how to make this any better.

Of all the places she traveled,

Yeah, they got the clothes and the shoes.
Just stay here. You'll be fine.

And where's the ring? The, uh...

Have yourself a real nice trip.

Yeah, you do that. Yeah, I said I will.

translation.en: I might not be here to get it.
Well, where are you gonna be, huh?

translation.es: Mamá, Emma es mi amiga. Lo aprecio, Grace,

This is what's gotten me through the last four years

Imagining myself walking along the Seine
and standing on top of the Eiffel Tower.
It's not going to turn you into a whole different person.

translation.en: Thank goodness. I'm kind of partial to the one I've got.

una de las obras maestras de...

and sort it all out, en francais?
Can we just please make the best of it?
I mean, we'll hardly ever be here.
Oh, great. Now find an outlet,
and I don't want to miss when Owen calls to apologize.

translation.en: We are having a good time.
No one is having a good time.
I get it, it's your thing, but come on, we're in Paris.

Wow. You can see everything from up here.

GRACE: Meg, the bus is leaving!
We don't have time! Excuse me!
Okay, Meg, it's a disaster! Are you happy?
Hey, it's okay. No, it's not.

translation.en: What is the matter with you?
I single-handedly chose the worst tour in all of Paris.

translation.es: Lamento que te hayan arrastrado a esto

translation.en: and that I'll have to hear about it every
translation.es: y que tendré que escucharlo en cada

translation.en: for the next however many years.
I'm sorry that I ever thought I was the kind of person that could come to Paris.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Can we just leave it at that?
What in the heck was that all...
I am sorry, but there is nothing.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero no hay nada.

and don't be whatever it is that you are.

translation.es: Mademoiselle Scott,mademoiselle Scott... No, Srta. Scott,

Mummy will think I'm off doing her errand.

GRACE: Emma. It may take a while.

Who does she think she is?
EMMA: I'm telling you, trust us. GRACE: You guys, easy.
Look at this. Look, with her hair pulled back.

No me parezco en nada a ella.

translation.en: You didn't even see her. I heard her.
Yeah, that's the same thing. That's crazy.

Scowl. (GROWLS) Do it. If only you were British.

Pero odio a la gente pobre.

It kind of sounds like a mean Mary Poppins. I like it, do more.

I want to see my friends. I want a golden goose.

translation.en: Excuse me, Miss Scott. Good news.
The courier successfully located your package.
(IN NORMAL VOICE) Oh, no, I'm not...
No. No, there has been a mistake.

translation.en: Your package will be here in the morning.

translation.en: we have found, as you requested,
(IN ENGLISH ACCENT) I shall take it in my room.
Can you imagine having a room like this and not even staying in it?

translation.en: Yeah. So, we're not staying here.
Great, now we have to make the bed.

Meg, come on, it's been a really long day.

but I think my car is here.

translation.en: Miss Scott, your package. Your package has arrived this morning.

translation.en: Let's help you to your car.
Oh, yes, please! Thank you, again.
No, thank you. But we'll walk.
But you cannot walk to the airport.

translation.en: MEG: They really do think you're her.
What? I want to know where we're going.
We're going back to our crap tour.

translation.en: We are going to Monte Carlo.
Grace, what does "prive" mean? Is that an airline?
See, Grace wants to go. Forget it.
The trip is paid for, whether Cordelia takes it or not.

translation.en: And she is a million miles away.

translation.en: Like you're going to pass that up.
I am never flying commercial again.

translation.en: Hello. Let's read all about you.
I don't look anything like that.
No, no, she has a better nose.
"...was caught by paparazzi in Reykjavik when she..."

I still made it before the little monster arrived.

translation.es: En nombrede la Fundación Familia Marchand

and Theo will be back to pick you up this evening.

This keeps getting better and better.
The Prince's ball. The one being thrown in her honor.

This is all paid for. You never leave when it's paid for.

Emma, Meg is right. This is too crazy.

¡Pero nos obligaste! ...para enterarte de que te harán un baile

translation.es: ...para enterarte de que te harán un baile y luego decir: "¡No, no puedo!"

translation.en: and then go, "Oh, no, I couldn't possibly!"
You go. Is this a real conversation?
we are way out of our league.

translation.en: They're going to see right through me.
Just keep up the accent and look down your nose.
translation.es: Mantén el acento, y mira de arriba a abajo.

translation.en: I'm sure Meg can help you out with that.
translation.es: Seguro que Meg puede ayudarte con eso.

translation.en: This was never part of the plan. I'm out.
translation.es: Esto no formaba parte del plan. Me voy.

translation.en: You know what the problem is with you two?

translation.en: It's that you are exactly alike.
We are nothing alike. We are nothing alike.
Okay, fine, you kids want a plan?
real Cordelia gets to play hooky for a few days,

translation.en: all get the vacation that I deserve.
All right, I'll tell you one thing right now, heels are a no.

translation.en: in an Oscar de la Renta.
translation.es: es un Oscar de la Renta.

translation.en: Oh, I just did my make-up.
Save the tears for the police.

translation.en: Can you just for one minute...
Y'all, I think mine is on backwards.

translation.en: Or maybe the other me has a little more going on upstairs.

translation.en: Just feels like something... Is missing?
What are you hearing from the girls?
Paris, man, that is far out.
We don't call it the City of Love for nothing.

translation.en: Is that Emma? Is Emma there?
Yeah, well, we'll see about that.
EMMA: Would you relax? She is with French fry.
I thought you were keeping an eye on her.
(WHISPERING) Why do people keep staring? Is something slipping?

Tu donación para la subasta del viernes.

translation.es: Mi padre diceque podremos construir 20 escuelas

translation.en: Well, people are maybe looking at your necklace,
translation.es: Bueno, la gente mira tu collar,

translation.en: but me, I have been admiring the boots.

translation.en: Oh, uh, how do you do?
Hey, how you doing? MEG: Yeah, hi.
Hey, Cordelia, you were supposed to wait by the door.

translation.en: I was, but then he had me working the room.
translation.es: Estaba allí, pero él me llevó a la sala.

No, thank you, Dom. He's not talking to you.
translation.es: No, gracias, Dom. No está hablando contigo.

translation.en: My father is very grateful to your aunt.
translation.es: Mi padre está muy agradecido con tu tía.

translation.en: She persuaded your mother to donate to our charity.

translation.en: MEG: Alicia Winthrop Scott was married to your late Uncle William.
translation.es: Alicia Winthrop Scott,se casó con tu finado tío William.

translation.en: Well, hello, it's called HELLO! magazine for a reason.

translation.en: Okay, you were born in Shropshire, parents divorced.
Schooled at Le Rosey, but you were expelled

translation.en: because you set your roommate's hair on fire
translation.es: le encendiste el peloa tu compañera de cuarto

translation.en: I'm so glad to see that you're here.
Well, where else would I be than here,
in Monte Carlo, where I'm supposed to be?

translation.en: I just wanted to come and verify your presence for myself.

translation.en: Some peace of mind for your poor mother.
translation.es: Para tranquilizar a tu pobre madre.

translation.en: Well, lovely to see you. Now if you'll excuse me.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I can't quite put my finger on it.
You can report back to Mother that I'm doing as told.
translation.es: Puedes informar a mi madreque estoy obedeciendo.

translation.en: Excuse me. Well, you two seem very close.
translation.es: Con permiso. Ustedes parecen muy cercanas.

translation.en: How long are you here in Monte Carlo?
Emma. We got to go. No, I'm good.
translation.es: Emma. Tenemos que irnos. No, estoy bien.

translation.en: Aunt Alicia, here to see her favorite niece, Cordelia.
translation.es: La tía Alicia, vino a ver a su sobrina favorita, Cordelia.

translation.en: And we have to stay here till Friday.
No, I'm telling you, she thinks you're Cordelia!
You were just crazy enough! Excuse me,
I'm going to dance with her. Sorry.
translation.es: pero bailaré con ella. Lo siento.

translation.en: Okay, you have a taxi station just over here. Straight on.
translation.es: Allá hay una parada de taxis. Derecho.

translation.en: You have to rotate every three minutes for optimal coverage.
translation.es: Tienes que voltearte cada tres minutospara el bronceado perfecto.

translation.en: I picked out a dress for you.
Why are you picking a fight with me?
I know what you think of me.
You have no idea how little I think about you.
translation.es: No tienes ni ideade lo poco que te considero.

translation.en: You see, Grace, she's just not happy
unless everybody around her is miserable.
translation.es: a menos que los demás estén mal.

translation.en: I forgot about you the minute you left high school.
translation.es: te olvidé apenas terminaste la secundaria.

translation.en: And who quits high school for a catalog shoot in Dallas?

translation.en: Of a Clip 'n' Save. You are so delusional.
Okay, you know what this is? We had a big night last...
You know what your problem is? It's that you are just jealous.
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuál es tu problema? Eres celosa.

translation.en: Your best friend is an 18-year-old girl.
Okay, who died and made you such a...
Ma petite-amie. Emma. You answered her phone.
translation.es: Ma petite-amie. Emma.Usted atendió su teléfono.

translation.en: Come on, help me out. She's my fiancee. Here, take a look.
translation.es: Vamos, ayúdeme. Es mi novia. Mire.

translation.en: Yeah, you know her. Where did she go?
You're not following me, are you?
It left us behind a long time ago.
Chip-chop, spit-spot, come on, let's go!
Off we go! Quickly, come on!
All right, this is what you've been waiting for.
Bring it on. I want to see this.
All right, I'll have a go. All right.
There we go. That's it. You actually know how to do it.
Bonjour, Lucille, this is Mademoiselle Scott.
Lucille will take care of you, she'll show you to your room.
translation.es: Lucille te llevará a tu habitación.

translation.en: Change? I'll see you on the field.
I'd love to stay and chat,
Polo, how hard can it be?
Hey! I think we are going the other way.
translation.es: ¡Oye! Creo que vamos para el otro lado.

translation.en: Oh, right. See, at home they usually just bring the ball to me.
translation.es: Sí. Verás, en casa suelen traerme la bola.
Sí. Para el otro lado. Está bien.

translation.en: Usually with more finesse than spirit.
So, you just go wherever you like?
I'll let you know when I'm done.
And your parents are okay with this?
I think they were just happy to see me walk out of there, you know?
translation.es: Creo que les dio gusto que me fuera.

translation.en: What, did they say you'd never walk again or something?
translation.es: ¿Qué, les dijeronque no volverías a caminar?

translation.en: I was never much good at being told what I couldn't do.
translation.es: Nunca me gustó que me dijeranlo que no podía hacer.

translation.en: But I was in hospital for a year just flat on my back.
translation.es: Pero estuve en el hospital un año, en cama.

translation.en: My teammates would come and visit in the beginning,
translation.es: Mis compañeros de equipome visitaban al principio,

translation.en: I was just a reminder of what could happen to them.
translation.es: empecé a recordarleslo que podía sucederles.

translation.en: get hit in the wrong place, never play rugby again.
translation.es: te golpeas en el lugar equivocado,y no juegas al rugby nunca más.

translation.en: just seemed like the best way back.
I can't find my way back.
I went to the hospital to see her every day she was there.
translation.es: Fui al hospital a verlacada día que ella estuvo allí.

translation.en: Everyone was so nice, and understanding, and comforting, and...
translation.es: Todos fueron muy amables,comprensivos, me consolaron...

translation.en: Look, I won't even listen. I won't listen.
Come on, hit the ball. Cordelia!
Is it all right if I take her? I'd love to brush her down.
You've never been one to clear up after yourself.
translation.es: Nunca te ocupaste de ordenar tus cosas.

translation.en: A new leaf, a new me.
translation.es: Una nueva hoja, una nueva yo.

translation.en: It appears you've made a friend.
I know. Isn't she a beauty?
Remember that darling pony you had as a girl?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas ese lindo ponique tenías de niña?

translation.en: My childhood, please! You know I never look back.
translation.es: ¡Mi infancia, por favor!Sabes que nunca miro atrás.

translation.en: Oh, you remember the black one
with the little white star on his forehead.
translation.es: con la estrellita blanca en la frente.

translation.en: I really should get her back to the stables, so...
translation.es: Tengo que llevarla al establo, así que...

translation.en: And you, if I'm not mistaken, were taught to ride Western.
translation.es: Y a ti, si no me equivoco,te enseñaron con la occidental.

translation.en: I'm just a little out of practice, that's all.
translation.es: Me falta práctica, eso es todo.

translation.en: Well, this is a new low even for Cordelia.
translation.es: Es una nueva bajeza, incluso para Cordelia.

translation.en: To hire a look-alike to stand in her stead
translation.es: Contratar a una chica parecidapara que vaya en su lugar

translation.en: at a charity event organized just for her
translation.es: a un evento de beneficenciaorganizado para ella,

translation.en: I don't know if it's the champagne
translation.es: No sé si es la champaña

translation.en: or the sunlight that's got to you.
translation.es: o el sol lo que te afectó.

translation.en: Oh, I will call security immediately.
that I will do whatever is expected of Cordelia tomorrow.
translation.es: que mañana harélo que se espere de Cordelia.

translation.en: I'm not about to stand in the way of helping those kids.
translation.es: No entorpeceré la ayuda para esos niños.

translation.en: No one must ever know. Is that clear?
Here you are. What a wonderful match.
The ambassador is ready for us.
If you muck this up, you will have me to answer to.
translation.es: Si arruinas esto, yo me ocuparé.

translation.en: Both of you. Pass it on.
Bling, bling, bling, bling, bling, bling, bling...
It's one of the two things my father taught me.
translation.es: Es una de las dos cosasque me enseñó mi padre.

translation.en: It's actually more handy than you might think.
translation.es: Es más útil de lo que piensas.

translation.en: No, here. Put your fingers like this
translation.es: No, así. Pon los dedos así,

translation.en: and now curl your tongue like that.
translation.es: y ahora dobla la lengua así.

translation.en: You make me think it is.
Mostly I always feel the same.
Same people, same conversations, same parties.
translation.es: La misma gente, las mismasconversaciones, las mismas fiestas.

translation.en: I mean, you're raising money, building schools.
I wish I were part of something that important.
translation.es: Quisiera formar partede algo tan importante.

translation.en: But that's my father. That's not me.
translation.es: Pero lo hace mi padre. No yo.

translation.en: I've never been to those schools.
I've never been to Africa, to Romania.
translation.es: Nunca estuve en África, en Rumania.

translation.en: I'm only faking my way through.
I know what that feels like.
But there is nothing fake about you.
translation.es: Pero no hay nada falso en ti.

translation.en: I want to show you something.
And then we're gonna go meet his friends
and then we're gonna go dancing!
Meg, what has gotten into you?
There's the Meg that I know.
translation.es: Ésa es la Meg que conozco.

translation.en: THEO: I'm trying to impress you.
GRACE: Mmm. So far, so good.
When I was little, I had a snow globe of the Eiffel Tower,
translation.es: De niña, tenía una bola de nieve de cristalde la Torre Eiffel,

translation.en: and when you wound it up it played
translation.es: y cuando le dabas cuerda, sonaba

translation.en: And when I shook it, the snow inside sparkled.
translation.es: Y cuando la sacudía, la nieve brillaba.

translation.en: Look at this one. ♪ Angels sing from above
I had a lovely time tonight.
Theo, I need to tell you something.
I'll see you at the auction, all right?
You know how on Hastings Avenue,
how all the houses are set way back?
translation.es: todas las casas están ubicadas hasta atrás?

translation.en: With the front walks and big lawns and driveways.
translation.es: Con grandes aceras,mucho césped, entradas para autos.

translation.en: I always wondered about the kind of people that lived there.
translation.es: Siempre me preguntépor la gente que vivía allí.

translation.en: You know, the kind of people with
the dimmer switches on their lights.
translation.es: interruptores más tenues en las luces.

translation.en: I thought Owen and I were gonna
live in a house like that one day.
translation.es: viviríamos en una casa así algún día.

translation.en: I don't need a fancy house.
Grace, what if I blew it?
Hey, don't you worry about it.
I know. I know you will.
translation.es: Lo sé. Sé que lo harás.

translation.en: I finally meet a guy who likes me for me,
translation.es: Finalmente conozco a un chicoa quien le gusto por como soy,

translation.en: But I feel like I am when I'm with him.
translation.es: Pero siento que lo soy cuando estoy con él.

translation.en: If Theo finds out, he's gonna hate me.
translation.es: Si Theo se entera, me odiará.

translation.en: Once he knows the real you,
translation.es: Grace, confía en mí. Cuando te conozca realmente,

translation.en: he's just gonna know how lucky he is.
I knew it from the minute I laid eyes on you.
translation.es: Lo supe desde el momento en que te vi.

translation.en: Back up to the old Grimaldi Suite.
translation.es: De regreso a la vieja Suite Grimaldi.
La oferta sigue en pie, Meg.

translation.en: It's not as posh as this.
translation.es: No es tan elegante como esto.

translation.en: You just pitch your tent right on the beach.
translation.es: Pones la tienda en la playa.

translation.en: The train leaves at noon if you change your mind.
translation.es: El tren sale al mediodía, si cambias de idea.

translation.en: Will you relax? It's okay, she is right here.

translation.es: El artículo habla de millones, Emma.

translation.en: Yeah, I heard you the first hundred times.
translation.es: Sí, te oí las primeras cien veces.

translation.en: On my neck. I'm not going to relax
translation.es: En mi cuello. No me calmaréhasta que eso vuelva a su estuche.

translation.en: until that thing is back in its case.
translation.es: No me calmaréhasta que eso vuelva a su estuche.

translation.en: What is going on with you two?
Can you please just give her the necklace?
It's in his backpack. I put it in his backpack to be safe!
translation.es: Está en su mochila.¡Lo puse en su mochila por seguridad!

translation.en: Okay, so Riley has it. Where is he staying?
translation.es: Está bien, lo tiene Riley.¿Dónde está alojado?

translation.en: No, Emma, he didn't steal anything.
He's getting on a train to Italy.
Are you kidding me? At noon.
How far is the train station from here?
translation.es: ¿Qué tan lejos está la estación de aquí?

translation.en: Oh, hey, what's she doing here?
Forgot how I hate the French.
translation.es: Olvidé cuánto odiaba a los franceses.

translation.en: Do not even think about it.
Well, can you wait for me?
I just have this tiresome auction I have to deal with.
translation.es: Tengo que ocuparmede esta fastidiosa subasta.

translation.en: I was meant to have a suite.
Stavros is supposed to be here, isn't he?
If you have finished, you may go.
If you have finished, you may go.
Emma, go. No, I can't move.
EMMA: I can't breathe, I can't breathe, I can't breathe.
translation.es: No puedo respirar, no puedo respirar.

translation.en: So unfair. I never get to see my friends.
translation.es: Muy injusto.Nunca puedo ver a mis amigos.

translation.en: I never do what I want.
When is it going to be my turn?
Let's just get on a train and go.
I pretended to be that girl and now I lost her necklace.
translation.es: Me hice pasar por esa chicay ahora perdí su collar.

translation.en: What? I have to fix this.
Could you be a little positive?
One night out and look at you.
I was wondering if you could tell me
where the Grimaldi Suite is, please.
I've been robbed. Call the police.
translation.es: Me robaron. Llame a la policía.

translation.en: No, I said police! Call the police!
translation.es: ¡No, a la policía! ¡Llame a la policía!

translation.en: No, I said police! Call the...
Oh, forget it! I'll do it myself!
Police? I'm calling to report a robbery at the Hotel de Paris.
translation.es: ¿Policía? Llamo para denunciarun robo en el Hotel de Paris.

translation.en: Someone has been robbed? No, nobody.
Theo! Nobody has been robbed. We're all right.
translation.es: ¡Theo! Nadie sufrió un robo. Estamos bien.

translation.en: Well, because this feels like a game.
(IN NORMAL VOICE) It's not a game. Not to me.
translation.es: No es un juego. Para mí no.

translation.en: But I do need to tell you something.
It starts in five minutes. Ladies, five minutes.
translation.es: Empieza en cinco minutos.Chicas, cinco minutos.

translation.en: The necklace! Do not touch that bell!
Hi. I need to find this girl.
translation.es: Hola. Tengo que encontrar a esta chica.

translation.en: Thought it was a pretty good excuse for a second shot.
translation.es: Pensé que era una gran excusapara otra oportunidad.

translation.en: Wait for me in the lobby. You got it.
Don't leave. I'm not going anywhere.
translation.es: -No te vayas.-No me iré a ninguna parte.

translation.en: Hold on one second there, boss.
You're telling me that Emma is staying here?
I told you this. Mademoiselle Scott's friend.
translation.es: Eso le dije.La amiga de mademoiselle Scott.

translation.en: GRACE: Listen... Save your sorries for the police.
But it's right here. I have it.
translation.es: Pero está aquí. Lo tengo yo.

translation.en: It's just a case of mistaken identity.
translation.es: Es sólo un caso de identidad equivocada.

translation.en: It's impersonation and it's a crime,
one I'm putting a stop to this instant.
translation.es: y le pondré fin en este instante.

translation.en: Let me assure you that there will be no auction now.
translation.es: Te aseguro que no habrá subasta hoy.

translation.en: Hey! People are counting on her!
I promise you it is a false alarm.
translation.es: Les juro que es una falsa alarma.

translation.en: She said everything was fine. Quoi?
Excusez-moi. We had a call. There was a robbery?
translation.es: Excusez-moi. Recibimos una llamada.¿Hubo un robo?

translation.en: Yes, she couldn't find her necklace.
What? Where is she? I'm right here.
I can't quite manage the clasp.
But tell me, we heard a scream.
right now, she was so, so happy.
translation.es: hace un momento, se puso muy contenta.

translation.en: Yes, I'm very sorry to have wasted your time.
translation.es: Sí, lamento muchohaberles hecho perder tiempo.

translation.en: allow me to escort you, mademoiselle, you know, as a precaution.
Would you? I'm afraid I'm already late.
We'll let you go as soon as the auction is over.
translation.es: Te soltaremos cuando termine la subasta.

translation.en: you'll think of the girl you showed the fireworks to.
translation.es: pensarás en la chicaa la que mostraste los fuegos artificiales.

translation.en: Owen! What are you doing here?
Trust me, you don't want to go up there.
translation.es: Créeme, es mejor que no vayas.

translation.en: Why is she talking like that?
Please, both of you, just stay here.
translation.es: Por favor, los dos, quédense aquí.

translation.en: It's fine, he's waiting with Riley.
translation.es: ¿Qué le dijiste? Está bien, espera con Riley.

translation.en: I'm really glad you came, Meg.
translation.es: Me alegra mucho que hayas venido, Meg.

translation.en: I wouldn't miss this for the world.
translation.es: No me lo perdería por nada en el mundo.

translation.en: You will never get away with this.
translation.es: No se saldrán con la suya.

translation.en: Honey, we've been getting away with this for days.
translation.es: Cariño, nos salimos con la nuestrahace días.

translation.en: What are you... What are you doing here?
What am I doing here? I've been
running all over Paris looking for you.
You went all the way to Paris for me?
I don't want to lose you, Emma.
Maybe I was trying to fence you in a bit.
translation.es: Quizá traté de limitarte un poco.

translation.en: that once you saw everything there was to see here,
translation.es: que al ver todo lo que había aquí,

translation.en: And look, I'm sorry for that,
because I don't ever want to keep you from something better.
translation.es: porque no quiero privarte de algo mejor.

translation.en: But I already have the best.
So, Paris. It's pretty awesome, right?
What was what, honey? You heard it.
No, I didn't. Is someone in there?
What? Is someone in here? No.
BERNARD: We have a bid for 2.5.
Mesdames et messieurs, who will take us to 3,000,000?
There's something I need to say.
...that you must be the change you wish
translation.es: ...que debes ser el cambio que deseas

translation.en: It's true. I'm not Cordelia Scott.
translation.es: Es verdad. No soy Cordelia Scott.

translation.en: I'm just a regular girl from Texas.
translation.es: Soy una chica común de Texas.

translation.en: but I had the chance to be,
translation.es: pero tuve la oportunidad de serlo,

translation.en: even if it was only for a minute, and I took it.
translation.es: aunque fuera por un momento,y la aproveché.

translation.en: I know what I did was wrong
and I don't expect you to forgive me.
translation.es: y no pretendo que me perdonen.

translation.en: But it wasn't all a lie.
translation.es: Pero no fue todo una mentira.

translation.en: We're from Texas, we go big.
Look at them, none of them do.
Look, you all came here to help those kids.
translation.es: Miren, ustedes vinieronpara ayudar a esos niños.

translation.en: Please don't let my mistake get in the way of that.
translation.es: Por favor, no permitanque mi error entorpezca eso.

translation.en: I may not deserve your help,
translation.es: Quizá yo no necesite su ayuda,

translation.en: I would like to bid 6,000,000 euros

translation.es: ...que tiene esa joven en el cuello,

translation.en: I'm doing precisely as she has asked.
translation.es: Estoy haciendo precisamentelo que ella pidió.

translation.en: Sold for 6,000,000 euros to one Miss Scott.
translation.es: Vendido por 6.000.000 de eurosa la Srta. Scott.

translation.en: Why are you just standing there? Arrest them!
For what? They seem very nice.
They stole my necklace. But the necklace is here, no?
translation.es: Me robaron el collar. Pero el collar está aquí, ¿no?

translation.en: Well, they kidnapped me and they tied me up.
And yet, you too are here.
I see no problem, everybody is very happy.
translation.es: No veo ningún problema,todos están muy contentos.

translation.en: Excuse me, but I am not happy.
translation.es: Perdón, pero yo no estoy contenta.

translation.en: But this I can do nothing about.
translation.es: No puedo hacer nada al respecto.

translation.en: GRACE: I don't know, Meg. Have you really thought about this?
But what did you tell your dad?
translation.es: Pero, ¿qué le dijiste a tu papá?

translation.en: Well, I told him I'd call and check in every day,
translation.es: Le dije que llamaré todos los días,

translation.en: that I won't tell him everything I'm doing,
translation.es: que no le contaré todo lo que haga,

translation.en: that I'll be back in August,
My driver will take you to the airport.
translation.es: Mi chofer los llevará al aeropuerto.

translation.en: Please tell Theo I said goodbye.
Yeah, we had an amazing time.
Hey, Grace, I need somebody to run to the post office.
translation.es: Oye, Grace, necesitoque alguien vaya al correo.

translation.en: Now I am going to show you the foundation of the new stadium,
translation.es: Ahora le mostraré la basedel nuevo estadio,

translation.en: which is possibly to be ready by the end of the month.
translation.es: que posiblemente estará listo a fin de mes.

translation.en: We will have new lighting for each classroom,
translation.es: Tendremos iluminación nuevaen todas las aulas,

translation.en: and the computers will be here by September.
ARCHITECT: So, what do you think?
This follows the same model as you saw it in Rajasthan.
translation.es: Esto sigue el mismo modeloque vio en Rajastán.

translation.en: And on the other side we have the garden.
translation.es: Y del otro lado tenemos el jardín.

translation.en: I don't think that we've properly met.
